content: 12 working in blo single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch pulling color a through chain 1 do not turn round 13 working in both loops as normal single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch and fasten_off cut all colors leaving 6 tails and weave in ends turn cuff up as shown copyright 2017 2003 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not reproduce pattern for commercial purposes 2
